DOC.brief_summary: The aim propose study examine whether long-term dietary supplementation ( 8 week ) oat flour cookie rich avenanthramides ( AVA ) could enhance blood antioxidant capacity reduce blood inflammatory marker downhill run ( DR ) protocol among human subject .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female nonobese subject ( 18kg/M2 < BMI < 28kg/M2 ) ( age 2045 year ) recruit Twin Cities community . All participant sign inform consent approve UMNIRB willing avoid oat consumption rigorous physical activity day prior test consume lowpolyphenol diet 1 week prior study . The food rich polyphenols include berry , apple , pear , citrus fruit , fruit juice , onion , chocolate , wine , coffee , tea , bean , nut , soy product spice 1 . Presence GI condition interfere absorption ; 2 . Clinically significant endocrine , cardiovascular , pulmonary , renal , hepatic , pancreatic , biliary neurologic disorder ; 3 . Major trauma surgery within 3 month visit ; 4 . Cancer prior 2 year ; 5 . Allergic oat product ; 6 . Women pregnant lactating ; 7 . Smoking ; 8 . Drinking alcohol > 5 drinks/week ; 9 . Using nutraceuticals ; 10 . Blood pressure medication ; 11 . NSAID ( > 800 mg ibuprofen/week ) 12 . Vitamin supplementation 13 . Anticoagulants hypoglycemic drug 14 . Oat product consumption rigorous physical activity day test consumption highpolyphenol diet week prior test . 15 . Moderateintensity cardiorespiratory exercise training ≥30 min•d−1 ≥5 d•wk−1 total ≥150 min•wk−1 , vigorousintensity cardiorespiratory exercise training ≥20 min•d−1 ≥3 d•wk−1 ( ≥75 min•wk−1 ) , combination moderate vigorousintensity exercise achieve total energy expenditure ≥5001000 MET•min•wk−1
